snippet.title: RoboSkate - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist RoboSkate:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1404530/RoboSkate/

Learn to be the operator of a robotic arm slapped on a skateboard as you embark on an awkward adventure through a divine realm. Your quest will not be straightforward, as simply moving presents an obstacle with this strange form of motion. Once you feel like you've conquered physics, sinister twists, bends and ledges will elevate the difficulty to a new level and harden you to become the ultimate robotics controller.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RoboskateGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/J2tKyW3
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RoboskateGame
